doc.previous: In vertical flight the mono tiltrotor uses controls very similar to a coaxial helicopter such as the Kamov Ka 50 Yaw is controlled for instance by increasing the lift on the upper proprotor while decreasing the lift on the lower proprotor Roll and pitch are provided through rotor cyclic Vertical motion is controlled with conventional rotor blade blade pitch 27
